title: Let's look into another masterstroke by Modiji
selftext:
National emblem on food plates for G20 dinner. 

Source: https://twitter.com/BhavikaKapoor5/status/1699730057483485470
comments: You are underestimating our Modiji. Whatever he does instantly becomes a masterstroke.
Le bhakt : it's indirect message to whole world to save lions.. it's MAAAASSSTTTEEERRR SSSTTTTRRRROOOKKKKKEEEE
